name: C-Casette Rental Shop
description:
Click the C-casette to rewind it and rent it for §0.01. 

Gain money(§) to get better equipment to start doing this automatically: Hire workers, buy real estate, enslave whole countries. Build manufacturies on planets and start your interstellar journey to become the number 1 casette rewinder. In the end you can always ask help from the gods!

(A clicker-idle -game made for Brackeys Game Jam - Theme: REWIND)

Bonus Mechanics:

ANCIENT MIX TAPE : Quadruple value in automatic rewinds.

MAGIC PEN: Every REWIND-click actually rewinds casettes equal to your automatic rewinds value.
